artist: Artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Publisher: Ōhashiya Yashichi
catalogue_raissonne: Keyes, Courage and Silence (1982), no. 223.25; Iwakiri, Yoshitoshi (2014), p. 285.
creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
description: one sheet; man in profile from PL with a sword across his back; hair in a ponytail; white headband; red sleeve with black grid design; blue smoke at top; cannon in LLQ
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From One Hundred Types Selected by Yoshitoshi (Kaidai hyakusen sō 魁題百撰相)
signed: 一魁斎芳年筆 {Ikkaisai Yoshitoshi hitsu}
title: Akechi Samanosuke
